title: Lag spikes in Ranked Game
body:
Did a game on my main and 5 people out of 10 lagged out every 15 sec for about 2 secs, 
alot of player saying that they have bugg too

replies.body: Well since many players are seeing it, it may be a widespread ISP issue. If you go ahead and run through our [Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) this should locate the issue and then you can forward that on over to our[ tech team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if it's still an issue!
